chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has a problem:
The screen stopped working and I can't do anything with the phone, not even turn it off, etc...
Thank you,

The customer confirms that the device has not been opened or repaired by a third party, exposed to water or suffered damage from impact or fall.

Hello Lourdes: You will find the return label attached to this message. Chronopost will process your return. Please choose a location that is convenient for you to send your package. You can find a list of drop-off points here: https://www.seur.com/en/busqueda-tiendas.do Preparation of your return: 1. Check the instructions on how to return a product here 2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your item 3. Remove any protective case or screen protector it may have 4. Package your item and its accessories following the below guidelines Packaging of the item: • The box should be strong and resistant. You must place your item safely inside the box so it won't move during transit. • Stick the return label on top of the box (you can also add an additional label inside to help identify your shipment in case the original label peels off or gets damaged). • Take photos of the interior and exterior of your package before sending it. This will protect you in case your item is damaged during transport. Your return is ready for shipping! We'll notify you when it arrives. Best regards, Customer Service at Back Market, Customer Service at Back Market

Hola, agente
El vendedor no puede proceder al reenvío debido al siguiente motivo:
El artículo está conectado a iCloud o Google.
Se ha añadido más información en este mensaje: Dear Backcare,

The phone we received was of a different IMEI of 354980618039627 instead of 356885190937528, and the phone is still linked to the iCloud, can you kindly request the customer to unlink their iCloud account? Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Dear ecomobile

Customer remove iCloud correctly. 

Regards,
Maria from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
AS
